Contributor: Stuart, Gilbert, 1755-1828, artist.; Walton Advg. & Prtg. Co., publisher.;
Description: The poster quotes at length George Washington's farewell address, September 17, 1796. The speech says that the government "has a just claim to your confidence and your support." Portrait of George Washington, from the original by Gilbert Stuart.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Boston, Mass. : Walton Advg. & Prtg. Co.,
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: George Washington
